title: Visual Dictionary: French: For Home, Business, and Travel (Barron's Visual Dictionaries)
description: Barron’s Visual For Home, Business, and Travel features 15,000 terms and 3,000 images to help you learn French. Small enough to fit into a purse or bag, this compact guide is ideal for travelers and beginner or intermediate speakers.This portable guide also Interesting in learning another language? Barron’s Visual Dictionaries are also available for Spanish, Italian, and English for Spanish speakers.
author: Barron's
